snippet: Twitter is counting on millions of websites to link to the service and is encouraging independent developers to find creative new uses for its platform.
abstract: Twitter, in effort to justify high valuation of its stock, is counting on millions of Web sites to link to its service and is encouraging independent developers to find creative new uses for its platform; start-ups like Gozaik, Tame and Nuzzel, are trying to build on Twitter's design, using it for springboard for their own companies.
lead_paragraph: Twitter is counting on millions of websites to link to the service and is encouraging independent developers to find creative new uses for its platform.

headline.main: To Grow, Twitter Looks Outside Its Own Walls
headline.print_headline: To Grow, Twitter Looks Outside Its Own Walls
